org.apache.commons.digester3.binder.RuleProvider

Packages that use RuleProvider
org.apache.commons.digester3.binder The Digester EDSL allows configure Digester using fluent APIs.

<R extends Rule>
ByRuleProviderBuilder<R>
LinkedRuleBuilder.addRuleCreatedBy(RuleProvider<R> provider)
          Add a custom user rule in the specified pattern built by the given provider.
